p: Ginsenosides suppress the induction of the proinflammatory cytokines IL-6, IL-8, and TNF-α and proteases, such as MMP-9, and inhibit oxidative stress (superoxide, NO and iNOS) [ 27]. A recent study showed that ginsenosides isolated from P. ginseng significantly increased proinflammatory IFN-γ levels in an ovalbumin-induced murine asthmatic model but lowered IL-4 production [ 78].
